comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This appears to be (left to right), unknown; (German) Captain Ludwig Ritter von Mann of the Moltke [1]; (US) Rear-Admiral Aaron Ward (1851-1918)[2], Acting Commander of the American Fleet; Count Von Bernstorff, German Ambassador to the United States; and (German) Rear Admiral Hubert von Rebeur-Paschwitz, Commander of the German Squadron during the Spanish-American War, on the occasion of the visit of the Kaiser at Kiel's fleet of three ships to New York City in June, 1912. – New York Times

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Second from right in the photograph, and standing at the rear of the main grouping is Lieutenant Work. See comparison photograph here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3512136031/
